title: New: Giraffage – With You
body:
It’s two thirty in the morning, I can’t sleep and my daily bandcamp trawl is proving fruitless.

However, as luck would have it, what should fall into my proverbial lap, but none other than a brand new cut from San Francisco producer **Giraffage**. _With You_ elegantly tiptoe’s the line between being an out-and-out electro-ambient waltz and a more sombre, thoughtful affair. Either way, which ever side you perceive it to fall on, it’s seductive powers have already begun to lull me into an intoxicating sleep. Breath it.

_‘Frolicking through fields with the one that you love on an overcast day.’_

 [With You](http://soundcloud.com/giraffage/with-you) by [Giraffage](http://soundcloud.com/giraffage)

With You elegantly tiptoe’s the line between being an out-and-out electro-ambient waltz \[…\]
